SceneDescription.name: Music Room - 1F
SceneDescription.description: The music room is equally as unused as half of the other rooms in the mansion. White walls decorated with gold trimming and cliche fleur-de-lis patterns match the white plush carpet. A harp sits in one corner of the room, overshadowed by the three grand pianos: one black, one white, and one almond brown.
